name: VMF Softech
overview: VMF Softech is an information technology company that provides applications software development and deployment services in India and the United States. It offers enterprise computing services, such as systems integration, data warehousing and data marts, enterprise wide system development and implementation, e-commerce software development and solutions, intranets and extranets, and groupware applications. The company also provides Internet technologies, including Web strategy formulation, Web site design, development, and maintenance; site hosting, Web marketing, and messaging solutions.
